mapper.select: select w.bNo, w.bookState, w.bdate, b.bookName, b.bookAuthor, b.bookPublish, b.bookPrice, b.rentP, b.bookImg, b.bookId From borrow w, bookinfo b where w.memId=#{memId} and w.bookId=b.bookId and (w.bookState=1 or w.bookState=2) order by w.bNo

select w.bNo, w.bookState, w.bdate, b.bookName, b.bookAuthor, b.bookPublish, b.bookPrice, b.rentP, b.bookImg, b.bookId From borrow w, bookinfo b where w.memId=#{memId} and w.bookId=b.bookId and w.bookState=3 order by w.bNo
